steps.name: Given  I open the Main page
Then  I push Login button from Bookstore Page
When  I input "cucumber1" to username field
When  I push the Login button
Then  I am on the Bookstore Page
When  I push the Bookstore Link In Sidebar
Then  I push Git Pocket Guide Link
Then  I on Git Pocket Guide Page
$("By.xpath: //label[@class='form-label' and contains(text(), 'Git Pocket Guide')]") should be(visible)
$("By.xpath: //label[@class='form-label' and contains(text(), 'Git Pocket Guide')]") should have(text "Git Pocket Guide")
When  I click Add To Your Collection Button, Book added to my Collection
$("By.xpath: //button[@id='addNewRecordButton' and contains(text(), 'Add To Your Collection')]") scroll to()
$("By.xpath: //button[@id='addNewRecordButton' and contains(text(), 'Add To Your Collection')]") click()
When  I click Back To Book Store Button
$("By.xpath: //button[@id='addNewRecordButton' and contains(text(), 'Back To Book Store')]") scroll to()
$("By.xpath: //button[@id='addNewRecordButton' and contains(text(), 'Back To Book Store')]") click()
Then  I push Programming JavaScript Applications Button Link
Then  I on the Programming JavaScript Applications Page
$("By.xpath: //label[@class='form-label' and contains(text(), 'Programming JavaScript Applications')]") should be(visible)
$("By.xpath: //label[@class='form-label' and contains(text(), 'Programming JavaScript Applications')]") should have(text "Programming JavaScript Applications")
When  I click Add To Your Collection Button, Book added to my Collection
$("By.xpath: //button[@id='addNewRecordButton' and contains(text(), 'Add To Your Collection')]") scroll to()
$("By.xpath: //button[@id='addNewRecordButton' and contains(text(), 'Add To Your Collection')]") click()
When  I click Back To Book Store Button
$("By.xpath: //button[@id='addNewRecordButton' and contains(text(), 'Back To Book Store')]") scroll to()
$("By.xpath: //button[@id='addNewRecordButton' and contains(text(), 'Back To Book Store')]") click()
When  I push the Profile Link In Sidebar
Then  Git Pocket Guide Book Is Displayed in Profile
$("By.id: see-book-Git Pocket Guide") should have(text "Git Pocket Guide")
Then  Programming JavaScript Applications Book Is Displayed in Profile
$("By.id: see-book-Programming JavaScript Applications") should have(text "Programming JavaScript Applications")
Then  I click a Delete Icon to Delete First Book In Profile
Then  I click On Cancel Button

fullName: Bookstore: Pushing Cancel button When Deleting A Book
